
```
NAME:
   docktool uuid - create random uuid

USAGE:
   docktool uuid [options]

DESCRIPTION:
   create random uuid

OPTIONS:
   -s, --short   short version of uuid (default: false)
   -n            do not print the trailing newline character (default: false)
   -h, --help    print this usage

EXAMPLES:
   docktool uuid
   docktool uuid -s
   docktool uuid -s -n

SEE ALSO:
   https://github.com/yingzhuo/docktool/tree/master/.github/uuid.md

```
